thread.title: Can You Guess The Question Rajamouli Was Asked?
thread.title_full: Can You Guess The Question Rajamouli Was Asked?

title: Can You Guess The Question Rajamouli Was Asked?
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
Rajamouli 's magum opus, Baahubali has broken all the possible boundaries and has won the hearts of international movie lovers. The other day, the film was screened at the popular Busan film festival, which stands as another feather in the already overstuffed cap. Baahubali - The Beginning (Telugu) (U/A): Book Your Tickets Right Away! 
The director was overwhelmed by the response he received at the screening and took to twitter to share his experiences from the alien land. 
"It was a nice feeling when your work is appreciated by people who doesn't speak your language..", read a tweet of Rajamouli. 
Adding further, he quizzed his followers to guess what was the most asked question at the screening while he revealed the another. 
"I had only two questions from most of the people "when is the second part releasing" and you know what is the second question.." 
The producer of the film, Shobu also took to twitter and shared few pictures from the screening.
